About Us

Having over 50 years of combined higher education experience, we have seen it all. We are a group of professionals that are dedicated to you and your family’s financial success. Many times college students select a college without having all the information needed make the best financial decision. This decision point can have a rippling effect for years to come, often times diminishing the overall financial health of the family.

At College CAP, we developed a model that will provide guidance to help a family truly understand what they can afford to pay for college. Our system will guide you through the process from start to finish to find you the best quality education for your budget.


Paul
Founding Partner

Paul is on a mission to help families navigate and make a better decision about college. With more than 25 years of financial aid, enrollment management and student lending experience serving in a variety of leadership roles at the University of New England, Bentley University, Lesley University and JP Morgan Chase, Paul has helped thousands of students successfully through the college process. In his different capacities, Paul has a deep understanding of enrollment management and financial aid strategies commonly used in the industry.
Bill
Founding Partner

Bill has over 15 years of experience in the higher education industry, specifically in financial services across varying institutions. Having seen first-hand the mistakes that many ill-informed students and families have made, and is determined to be an advocate for the student. Bill has worked with many families and enjoys seeing families make strong financial decisions based on actual data.
